remarks: Rewrite a sum over the von Mangoldt function as a sum over prime powers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)
statement:
fsumvma.1 $e |- ( x = ( p ^ k ) -> B = C ) $.
fsumvma.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumvma.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ NN ) $.
fsumvma.4 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Fin ) $.
fsumvma.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( p e. P /\ k e. K ) <-> ( ( p e. Prime /\ k e. NN ) /\ ( p ^ k ) e. A ) ) ) $.
fsumvma.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumvma.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ ( Lam ` x ) = 0 ) ) -> B = 0 ) $.
fsumvma $p |- ( ph -> sum_ x e. A B = sum_ p e. P sum_ k e. K C ) $.
$d A k p x $.
$d B k p $.
$d C x $.
$d K k x $.
$d P k p x $.
$d k p ph x $.
